apa swamin wahansegen siduwuna wishishtathama shasana sewaya lesa salakenne kotas 21 lesa bedi siti amarapura nikaya ekkota sha්ri lanka amarapura sha්ri dharmarakshitha nikaya bihi kirima yi. 1992 di apa swamin wahanse ema nikaye mahanayaka padawiyen pidum laddoya. 1958 ape්ral 21 da maharagama sha්ri wajiranyana dharmayathanaya sthapitha kirima, apa nahimiyange buddha shasanaye sewayata kapawunu jiwitha margaye sathapum kanuwaka yi kiwa haka.

galla, shri lanka nawika nauka dakshina aayathanaye pradhana jatiya parishrayedi eeye (14) ema awasthawa uthsawakarayen pawathwunu athara, ee sandaha pradhana aaradhitha amuththa washayen shri lankawe oostreliyanu mahakomasaris, garu brayis hachisan mahatha sahabhagi wiya.
mbaahu mita prathama 1973 sita 1989 wasara dakwa shri lanka mahabankuwෙ banku suparikshana katayuthu anshayaේ ha aarthika paryaේshana anshawala niladhariyaෙku laෙsa katayuthu kara atha.
